pages.title: Master Backpack
pages.text: This &eMaster Backpack&r will specifically &bpick up and hold items&r from &eMine and Slash&r and assist you with organizing your loot. Also equippable in its own dedicated &eCurios&r slot and accessible with a dedicated keybind (check controls).

This backpack acts like a sort of enderchest - so crafting more bags wont yield you more space but also means the contents cannot be lost in the event you lose the bag.

Dont forget to check all the tabs inside the bag for each of the 5 categories.

If you are still struggling with the sheer quantity of loot, you could also consider using the &eauto-salvage feature&r found in the Hub.
